column5: Hey Dave I was at the Subway in Tamarindo,Costa Rica a couple of days ago and they didn`t know ya! Ya better get your peeps out there spreading the Facts of Fishing gospel!
I think he tries to do all those locations in person..it a sacrifice, but he's a team player
Well he wasn't there being a team player on Wednesday, because I passed him pulling the boat through Norwood ! He was headed west.. me east..
LOL....This might start a new craze! Instead of Where's Waldo...It'll be Where's Dave!  Watch out Dave, here come the Paparazzi! lol
Ya, I was at the subway on Finch and Keele and no Dave promotion to be seen anywhere.
